name: Escape From The Depth
description:
Escape From the Depth is an interactive 3D horror game. You navigate through the submarine level trying to collect items to escape from a monster that roams the hallways of the submarine. The player is armed with a map and is told where to go and which items they will need to grab, all while trying to avoid the monster.



Features

  • Stealth
  • Multiple endings
  • Narrated story

Stealth
The player can crouch and peek between hallway to ensure that the monster is no lurking nearby.


Multiple endings
Near the end you are presented with two options. What you choose to interact with, will dictate what ending you will get.

Narrated story
The story is fully narrated. As the player collects the required items they need. The ships AI will indirectly reveal what happen to the ship and it crew members through conversation with the main character.
